title: Abbee
author: Abbee
content: The majority believe Korean movies are all about Love, well not all. I just find out recently that some K movies are worth Netflix and chill (lols). K movies lovers, let's drop that movie you can't seem to keep to yourself.Alchemy of Soul Devil's JudgeEve

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Korean Films I would suggest is Poetry by Lee Chang Dong- 2010Peppermint Candy by Lee Chang Dong- 2000Secret Sunshine by Lee Chang Dong- 2007 Treeless Mountain by So Yong Kim- 2008Burning by Lee Chang Dong- 2018Mother by Bong Joon Ho- 2009Take Car of my Cat by Jae Eun Jeong- 2001 Parasite by Bong Joon Ho- 2019

comments.author: Abbee
comments.body: Quote from: mich on September 07, 2022, 05:29:17 AMKorean Films I would suggest is Poetry by Lee Chang Dong- 2010Peppermint Candy by Lee Chang Dong- 2000Secret Sunshine by Lee Chang Dong- 2007 Treeless Mountain by So Yong Kim- 2008Burning by Lee Chang Dong- 2018Mother by Bong Joon Ho- 2009Take Car of my Cat by Jae Eun Jeong- 2001 Parasite by Bong Joon Ho- 2019Have you seen Alchemy of Soul 2022, I recommend it

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Finished watching alchemy of souls which am currently waiting for the season 2 by December. You should add BIG MOUSE to your list.Currently streaming it. That's for series. You can also check out: The Witch 1 & 2Alienoid.

comments.author: rememberwhen
comments.body: Korean movies that I would recommend especially if you are into a romantic-comedy and you want a light and chill drama you should watchIt's Okay not to be OkayMr. QueenFight for my WayWeight lifting fairyTouch your Heart
